diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Cholecystitis, Common bile duct obstruction, Dysphagia
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with confusion, elevated liver function tests (LFTs), and imaging revealing cystic structures in the gallbladder. The presence of gallstones, sludge in the gallbladder, and common bile duct filling defects led to the diagnosis of cholecystitis and common bile duct obstruction.
